Title: Complete C# Masterclass
ShortDescription: Learn C# from basics to advanced concepts
Description: A comprehensive course covering C# programming from fundamentals to advanced topics including OOP, LINQ, async programming, and more.

Title: Modern Web Development with ASP.NET Core
ShortDescription: Build professional web applications with ASP.NET Core
Description: Master ASP.NET Core MVC, Web API, Entity Framework Core, and modern web development practices.

Title: Machine Learning with Python
ShortDescription: Master machine learning algorithms and techniques
Description: Learn machine learning from scratch using Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow.

Title: Java Fundamentals and Spring Boot
ShortDescription: Build scalable backend systems with Java
Description: Learn core Java programming and backend development using Spring Boot, JPA, and REST APIs.

Title: Front-End Development with Angular
Description: Learn how to build responsive, modular, and interactive web applications using Angular and TypeScript.

Title: Data Analysis with Excel & Power BI
Description: Learn to clean, analyze, and visualize data using Microsoft Excel and Power BI dashboards.

Title: UI/UX Design Essentials
Description: Learn design principles, Figma, wireframing, and prototyping to design engaging user experiences.

Title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
ShortDescription: Understand the basics of protecting digital systems
Description: Learn the principles of network security, encryption, and ethical hacking to safeguard systems.

Title: Advanced SQL & Database Optimization
ShortDescription: Master complex queries and database tuning
Description: Explore stored procedures, indexing, query optimization, and database performance tuning.

Title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
ShortDescription: Build native mobile apps with Flutter and Dart
Description: Create cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter widgets, layouts, and Firebase integration.
